4.text: A line when the treasure increases

5.name: Sol
5.text:
"The treasures have increased! The bed is becoming
more comfortable! I want more... I want more...
ohhhhh..."

6.name: Sol
6.text:
"Ohhh... This mountain of treasures... With plenty
of gold coins, the bed is so comfortable... I'm so
happy..."

7.name: Sol
7.text:
"Ooooo... abundance... comfort... luxury... This
is my world..."

8.name: Sol
8.text:
"Ooooo... The dragon's instincts are being
stimulated... Happiness lies in mountains of
treasures..."

9.name: Sol
9.text:
"I'm glad I was born a dragon... This paradise...
the treasures are here..."

12.name: Sol
12.text:
"What the heck... I can't believe how comfortable
this is..."

13.name: Sol
13.text:
"Ahh... no... this drowsiness... it's taking me
somewhere..."

16.name: Sol
16.text: "I feel like I've grown a size larger!!"

17.name: Sol
17.text: "Ooooo... The door to a new world has opened..."

18.name: Sol
18.text: "I feel like I've grown in some way!"

19.name: Sol
19.text:
"An unknown world───This is what growth is all
about……"

23.name: Sol
23.text:
"Ooooo...! My nest has become splendid! Ehehe,
thank you~"

27.name: Sol
27.text:
"What a gorgeous transformation! It's like I've
become unrecognizable! Yay!"

30.name: Sol
30.text:
"Ooooo... I've powered up so much it's almost
overdone... It's like a castle!!"

32.name: Sol
32.text:
"Ehehe, let's keep decorating my nest more and
more! This is so much fun, ehehe."
